channel.title: Few Demise Source [ Delta ] problems

item.title: Few Demise Source [ Delta ] problems
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

  1. Character file resets every time i run the server ( deltes existing file and creates a blank character file )
  2. There was a command to add pkpoints, but i changed it to add a different thing in the character file as the pkpoints didnt do anything, i suppose it was anti-leech, so this is what the command is: if(command.startsWith("givekills") && (playerRights >= 3)) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.wincount += 100; updateText(); c.sM("You recieve 100 kills. Gratz."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } and heres the error:
    client.java:7873: cannot find symbol
    symbol : variable wincount
    location: class client
    c.wincount +=100
    ^
    It used to say pkpoints where wincount is, i just switched it.
    The problem seems to be the “.”, but that worked before?
  3. How do i make it so an item cannot be picked up?

Read full topic
